item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This is a placeholder page that shows you how to use this template site. KRS empowers you to manage your Kubernetes clusters with the help of cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence. This guide equips you with everything you need to get started and unlock the potential of KRS’s intelligent recommendations, proactive problem detection, and powerful health checks. Prerequisites Up and Running Kubernetes Cluster: Ensure you have a Kubernetes cluster running locally (e.
